MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Grahams Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 6:30AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:AM. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:20AM on 08 November 2020
